body_html: That makes sense, thanks a lot for the detailed descriptions @vfdev-5. It seems to me that it would be sufficient to always take the base_seed, even if it's going to be unused (since it's really cheap to do so). Could you please send a PR with the fix?
body_text: That makes sense, thanks a lot for the detailed descriptions @vfdev-5. It seems to me that it would be sufficient to always take the base_seed, even if it's going to be unused (since it's really cheap to do so). Could you please send a PR with the fix?
body: That makes sense, thanks a lot for the detailed descriptions @vfdev-5. It seems to me that it would be sufficient to always take the `base_seed`, even if it's going to be unused (since it's really cheap to do so). Could you please send a PR with the fix?
